title: Count Substrings That Differ by One Character
content: Given two strings and , find the number of ways you can choose a non-empty substring of and replace a single character by a different character such that the resulting substring is a substring of . In other words, find the number of substrings in that differ from some substring in by exactly one character. For example, the underlined substrings in and only differ by the /, so this is a valid way. Return the number of substrings that satisfy the condition above. A substring is a contiguous sequence of characters within a string. and consist of lowercase English letters only.
